title: "Retrieving data from server" infinitely loading when creating a custom game
body: The only way to stop it is to press cancel after it has loaded a while. I can't see anything missing in game though.

replies.body: It sounds like a connection problem might be getting in the way of you creating a custom match, so it can't retrieve anything.  Check out our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this and to make sure your network is in good shape.  Hopefully, that will get you able to play customs again!

Nono, custom games work perfectly fine, it's just that creating the lobby takes some time due to this. That's why I originally submitted it into bug reports, cause I don't think is something exclusive to me. Might be though, and in that case there is no problem, I can wait some time for a custom :)
